title: Resume/Curriculum Vitae Font Types
content:
Hello - I'm trying to identify all fonts involved in this document and hope someone can help me. Thanks for looking into it!

=== Top Right Corner =====  
Name & Address Section

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_4290.png)

===== Body Area =====  
Bold Red & Bold Black Headers  
Body Text

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_3935.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3_4854.jpg)
author: spandrox

comments.content:
===== Body Area =====  
Bold Red & Bold Black Headers: could be [Knockout HTF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061222/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/overview). Other possibility but less good to me: [Chalet Comprime HI](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061222/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chaletcomprime)
